name: SPACE CORTEX
description:
IMPORTANT:
This is a 95% complete build of the game!
The price will increase when the game is fully complete.

Explore a dangerous research station swarming with hostile drones under the control of a rogue superintelligence in this action-adventure-shooter three-way hybrid.

Current status of the project: 95% complete, missing only the final boss and a few polishing touches. Play single-player or local multi-player with a friend and two controllers!

CONTROLS:

This game is best played with two Xbox 360 or Xbox One controllers and a friend.
D-pad/Left stick: Move (Analog supported!)
X: Fire
A: Interact
B: Special item
Right trigger: Lock direction
Start: Map screen

Keyboard controls:
Arrow keys: Move
X: Fire
Z: Special item
Space: Interact
Shift: Lock direction
Q: Map screen, ''Select''
